mapper.select: select chef_no, email, name, nickname, self_intro, profile, (select count(*) from follow_HISTORY where chef_no=follow_HISTORY.FOLLOWED_ID) as followed_count, (select count(*) from follow_HISTORY where chef_no=follow_HISTORY.FOLLOWing_ID) as following_count from chef where chef_no = #{no}

SELECT distinct rb.recipebook_no, rb.recipebook_name, c.chef_no, (select count(*) from SUBSCRIPTION_HISTORY where rb.recipebook_no= recipebook_no) as subscription_count FROM chef c JOIN recipe r ON c.chef_no = r.chef_no JOIN recipebook rb ON rb.recipebook_no = r.recipebook_no WHERE c.chef_no = #{no} order by rb.recipebook_no asc

select r.recipe_no, r.introduction, r.recipe_title, r.chef_no, c.nickname, r.reg_date, r.recipebook_no, (select count(*) from LIKE_HISTORY where r.recipe_no=LIKE_HISTORY.recipe_no) as like_count from recipe r, chef c where c.chef_no = #{no} and c.chef_no = r.chef_no order by r.recipe_no desc

select chef_no, nickname, self_intro, password, profile, (select count(*) from follow_HISTORY where chef_no=follow_HISTORY.FOLLOWed_ID) as followed_count from chef c, follow_history f where f.followed_id = #{no} and c.chef_no = f.following_id order by f.reg_date desc

select c.chef_no, c.email, c.password, c.name, c.nickname, c.self_intro, f.reg_date, profile, (select count(*) from follow_HISTORY where chef_no=follow_HISTORY.FOLLOWed_ID) as followed_count from chef c, follow_history f where f.following_id = #{no} and c.chef_no = f.followed_id order by f.reg_date desc
